group_1.textLeft: *Pant...* *Pant...* Phew...

group_1.textRight: *Pant...* *Pant...*
Say, Sis... Do you think an Uwasa@would be alright...?
Sakurako might still be normal.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's go check.
Sakurako, are you there?

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe I was wrong?
Oh, there you are, Sakurako!

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness!@It looks like Uwasas are safe after all!

group_1.textRight: ｜Nemu can still move, so I can as well.｜
｜She's waiting for you at Hotel Fendt Hope.｜
｜You two should go see her.｜

group_1.textLeft: Alright, so Nemu is okay, too.
Sakurako, do you have any idea why everyone@has stopped moving?

group_1.textRight: ｜Unfortunately, I do not...@Perhaps Nemu does?｜

group_1.textLeft: We'll go check with her, then.

group_1.textRight: ｜Very well.｜

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Sakurako.
I thought we'd destroyed the Rumor,@so I had my doubts...
But there it is.

group_1.textRight: Do you know where we should try@looking for her?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. It's only a hunch, but I have the feeling@she's in the basement.
I sense magic...

group_1.textRight: Huh? I thought Nemu was alone.

group_1.textLeft: This reaction... It's Nemu and...!

group_1.textRight: I knew it was you, Touka!

group_1.textLeft: And that's not all...

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@You haven't all been together@since the Magius dissolved.
―Ui―@Did you guys do something@to make everyone stop moving?
―Nemu―@Please don't get the wrong idea, Ui.
―Nemu―@We were just discussing what we could@accomplish as three geniuses.
―Touka―@With the three of us together, anything is possible!
―Touka―@It's been my dream to be able to converse like this,
―Touka―@where we could come up with a plan that could leave@the entire universe staggering in amazement.
―Nemu―@Such chances were lost after Alina became amnesiac,@so I suppose your dream has finally come true.

group_1.textRight: Unfortunately, however, Alina has no interest@in participating...

group_1.textLeft: "Alina" came to una fine after uniting with@and being severed from Eve.
Without the tension of destroying humanity,
I don't feel like making art anymore.

group_1.textRight: But you have a talent that can change@the human race!
Talk about a waste...
Erm, in other words...with the three of you@here together like this,
is this the vision of the future you and Nemu@wanted to create?

group_1.textLeft: It's Touka's, specifically.

group_1.textRight: Then what did you want, Alina?
I'm guessing you weren't after something@with Touka and Nemu?

group_1.textLeft: I, Alina, simply wanted to talk to you and Ui.

group_1.textRight: With...us...?

group_1.textLeft: Sì.
You have a selfish, stubborn personality,
one capable of bringing even Touka and Nemu@to heel.
Such a feat is impossible to achieve even@for a genius.
That, too, is a talent, una abilità,@which you are born with,
and so Alina wanted to have a little chat@with the Tamaki sisters.

group_1.textRight: So this is their part of everyone's hopes@for the future...

group_1.textLeft: But right now, you're disconcerted.@Dissatisfied.
In this case, you would be happier@if you sought to destroy the past.

group_1.textRight: What are you even saying...?
Mokkyu, mokyui!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right! We have a question@for you guys!

group_1.textRight: While we can't understand what userName@espouses,
we've gathered that a great disturbance@has occurred,
because userName had been here earlier,@running about in a panic.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, but we were concerned about what@would happen if we left,
so we sent userName to bring you two to us.
Indeed, Touka. So may you explain what's@going on, Iroha?

group_1.textRight: ...I know this sounds hard to believe,
but everyone has suddenly stopped moving!
